downloadTitle: Security Update For Exchange Server 2013 CU18 (KB4073392)
downloadDescription: Security Update For Exchange Server 2013 CU18 (KB4073392)
detailsSection: About this download: This security update resolves a vulnerability in Microsoft Exchange Outlook Web Access (OWA). The vulnerability could allow elevation of privilege or spoofing in Microsoft Exchange Server if an attacker sends an email message that has a specially crafted attachment to a vulnerable server that is running Exchange Server.
systemRequirementsSection:
Exchange Server 2013 CU18 System Requirements and Prerequisites
For information about Exchange 2013 system requirements and prerequisites, see the following topics:
  • Exchange 2013 System Requirements
  • Exchange 2013 Prerequisites
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
